bibl.title: New Testament Epistolary Literature in the Framework of Ancient Epistolography.
bibl.note: Se réfère aux papyrus. Voir: I. Introductory Comments on Ancient Letter Writing (pp. 1730-1733); - II. The Greek Documentary Letter Tradition (pp. 1733-1739).
White John Lee, New Testament Epistolary Literature in the Framework of Ancient Epistolography.
